summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Strixaderm Lash Advance Eyelash Conditioner - Hypo Allergenic Eyebrow Enhancer Serum & Primer Mascara For Natural Eye Brow Growth & Thick Long Lashes Review Date: 2020/03/08 Store: STRIXADERM-MD Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '096563380000'} Review Text: Not a fan of this product because I was looking for something more like mascara. It doesn't fit my makeup needs in everyday life.

Katiebabs Review Title: A Pass For Me (C Grade) Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/10/25 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: If you like the scent of vanilla mixed in with soap, this body wash is for you. It creates a nice lather but it doesn't have that natural smell and more along the lines of chemical. But it does an okay job.

Katiebabs Review Title: Soap and Vanilla Combined (B Grade) Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Follain Everybody Bar Soap | Lavender & Bergamot, Skin Moisturizing Hand & Body Cleanser with Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Hydrate for Softer Skin, Non-Drying, Rich-Lather, Cruelty Free, 5 oz Review Date: 2020/11/12 Store: Follain Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Follain', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender', 'Material Feature': 'Cru, Non GMO, Dermatologist Tested', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 5.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '692764483009', 'UPC': '692764483009'} Review Text: Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs. The price may be a bit higher than most soaps, but this is a more quality brand and far from generic as you can get.

Katiebabs Review Title: Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Blue LED Hydrating Cream Mask 5 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women | Moisturizing Face Mask for Girls | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack | Sheet Mask For Face Review Date: 2021/02/19 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisture', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.67 x 0.98 x 7.28 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Review Text: These masks are too hard to put on your face because the mask is so wet and covered cream, it rips and leaves you without a full face mask. And if and when you can put the mask on your face without ripping it, it is uncomfortable, like you are wearing a wet paper towel. I would give this a pass.

Katiebabs Review Title: Masks Will Rip When Trying to Put on Face (D Grade) Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spanature Lavender Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection 4 Pack, Relaxing and Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: Spanature Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 4.29 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '088234470592'} Review Text: This lavender hand and body cream will have you wanting more of it. You do get a nice amount for your money. The texture, scent and overall constancy is very nice.

Katiebabs Review Title: You Want More of This Hand and Body Cream (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spanature Olive Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: Spanature Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.89 x 1.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: I really love this brand of hand and body cream because the olive scene is lovely, but not too overpowering. The travel size is perfect for the amount you can control so you don't use too much. A really nice body cream for any woman.

Katiebabs Review Title: Lovely Hand and Body Cream (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spanature Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz Review Date: 2021/05/09 Store: Spanature Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Green tea', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 2.1 x 1.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces'} Review Text: Spanature is a great skin care brand, and these green tea lotions are nice. The amount you get for the money is awesome, Once you use Spanature, you'll never look at any other hand lotion again.

Katiebabs Review Title: Spanature is a win for hand lotion (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Best Mom Ever French Milled Luxury Soap Set of 3 Bars (6.35oz) Review Date: 2021/05/20 Store: Jolitee Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Jolitee', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Jasmine, Rose, Chocolate, Chamomile, Verbena, Lemon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 2.7 x 1.6 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '659682147574'} Review Text: These soaps are a great gift for that special mom in your life. Nice smelling soaps that should last a long time so you won't lack soaps. The packaging is very appealing and adds to the overall gift type feeling.

Katiebabs Review Title: Nice Soap Set For Moms (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Eyelash and Eyebrow Enhancers:** Mixed satisfaction with lash conditioners; preference for more traditional makeup products like mascara.

- **Body Care and Soaps:** Strong interest in scented and moisturizing body wash, with a clear preference for unique, pleasant fragrances (vanilla, lavender, bergamot) and quality ingredients. Favorable toward natural products and those that provide a luxurious experience.

- **Lotions:** Regular purchases of hand and body lotions indicate a preference for hydrating, non-drying formulas. Highly rated products from a consistent brand suggest loyalty towards effective skin care.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Positive feedback on scents like lavender and olive, indicating a tendency toward calming, natural fragrances. 

- **Quality Considerations:** Willingness to invest in higher-priced, quality skincare indicates a preference for premium brands over generic options.

- **Travel-Sized Products:** Interest in travel sizes suggests a preference for convenience and versatility, particularly in lotion and body care items.

- **Review Ratings:** A mix of positive and critical feedback reveals discerning taste, with higher ratings generally aligned with favorable product qualities such as scent, texture, and effectiveness.

Overall, the individual exhibits a preference for quality beauty and skincare items, particularly those that are natural or premium, with an affinity for soothing fragrances and moisturizing properties.

target_interaction.title: Nice Shade But Sticky Texture (B- Grade)
target_interaction.text:
The lipstick is a nice color and shade but it is a bit on the sticky side so the texture may not feel right for some people. It also doesn't last as long as you expect and not so smudge proof, which is surprising when you look at the price.

Katiebabs
target_interaction.title_meta: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
features: LIQUID LIPSTICK: Lip Whip is a long-lasting, smudge proof, and waterproof liquid lipstick that goes on as a liquid and dries as a metallic matte. Provides all-day coverage in just one pigmented application. Stickiness can result if product is not allowed ample time to dry or if product is layered with more than 3 layers.

SMUDGE PROOF: Don't worry about eating your makeup with our Lip Whips. They stay on your lips not your food! Our Lips Whips won't stop you from kissing a loved one or biting into something messy. Apply your Lip Whip and leave it at home. Don't worry about reapplying.
BERRIED: Our Berried Lip Whip is a metallic red with hints of deep purple. We recommend Berried as a topping. It looks great on top of Raspberry Tiramisu or She's Just Jelly.
INGREDIENTS: We focus on using high quality and heatlhy ingredients. Our products are cruelty-free and contain vegan and paraben free ingredients with your skincare in mind.

BEAUTY BAKERIE: A powerful story of resilience and inspiration, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 with the mission to be sweet and sweeten the lives of others. The Beauty Bakerie brand is a direct reflection of Cashmere's perseverance and passion for high-quality, healthy ingredients that enhance everyone's beauty every day.
description: Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.
